h1.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h1.div: Beverly Keeps Learning: Classroom to Home

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: Welcome to the newly designed Beverly Keeps Learning webpage.

Thank you for the trust you have placed in us in educating your child. Our thoughts are with all of you as families navigate these difficult times. Please know that at any time, you may reach out to your building administrator, classroom teacher and/or myself to help you if you are experiencing difficulty during this crisis. While the work we are sharing here today requires online access, we are aware that some families may not readily have access to the internet. As such, we will be distributing hard copy packets for those families at our food distribution sites while we work with individual families to provide access or identify ways to keep learning alive for them!

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: Parent Communications - Coronavirus (COVID-19) - drop down for all prior Superintendent Communications

span.a: 3-25-2020 - Governor Baker closes all schools until May 4th
3-15-2020 - Governor Baker closes all schools until April 7th

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Parents and guardians - Here are the ways in which you can have a role in supporting learning as we transition from Classroom to Home!

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Students - Your teachers have created these wonderful enrichment activities for you while school is closed! We hope you enjoy them!

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Teachers-Here is a central place for all of you to access support and share your ideas! We cannot thank you enough for all that you do!

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-EehZO jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: PT Sans; font-size: 45px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We are committed to providing access to the nutrition Beverly children need. While schools are closed, we are offering free meals for all children.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Free meals for children ages 18 and younger

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Free breakfast will be delivered with each meal

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Children do not need to be enrolled in the Beverly Public School District

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Merriweather; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
